info.title: PlayMoney API
info.description:
[Discord](https://discord.gg/Q5CeSMFeBP) 路 [API key](https://playmoney.dev/settings/api) 路 [OpenAPI spec](https://github.com/casesandberg/play-money/blob/main/apps/api/openapi.json) 路 [Trading bot](https://github.com/casesandberg/playmoney-bot-trading) 路 [Mirror bot](https://github.com/casesandberg/playmoney-bot-manifold-mirror)

 Include `x-api-key: {{key}}` in the header of your requests.

post.summary: React to a comment, will remove reaction if already exists
Create a comment on an entity

get.summary: Get the balance for a list
Get the graph for a List of Markets

post.summary: Create a market in a list

get.summary: Get the activity for a market
Get the balance for a market
Get the balances for a market

post.summary: Buy an option in a market

get.summary: Get the graph for a market

patch.summary: Update an option in a market

post.summary: Get a quote for a market
Sell an option in a market

get.summary: Search for users, markets, and lists
Get the balance for a user
Get the graph for a user
Get the stats for a user
Check if a username is available
Get the balance for the current user
Get notifications for the current user

post.summary: Mark all notification as read for the currenty user

get.summary: Get all referrals for the current user
Get a user by referral code
